message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll be happy with it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $175 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it. Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $140 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $160. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $160, but I'm still only able to go up to $150. That's my final offer.
